lead_paragraph: Mehdi Meklat was a favorite of the elite, a celebrated chronicler of the troubled suburb. He was also the author, it turns out, of hateful and obscene tweets.

headline.main: Factbox: Findings of Senate Tax Probe a Focus of IRS Search at Caterpillar
